text: The White Sheep is a 1924 American silent comedy film directed by Hal Roach and starring Glenn Tryon, Blanche Mehaffey and Jack Gavin.Munden p.895 ==Cast== * Glenn Tryon as Tobias Tyler * Blanche Mehaffey as Patience Matthews * Jack Gavin as Nelse Tyler * Bob Kortman as Milt Tyler * Leo Willis as Mose Tyler * Richard Daniels as Al Morton * Chris Lynton as Judge Matthews * J.J. Clayton as Tom Calvert * Dick Gilbert as Newt Randall ==References== ==Bibliography== * Munden, Kenneth White. The American Film Institute Catalog of Motion Pictures Produced in the United States, Part 1. University of California Press, 1997. ==External links== * Category:1924 films Category:1924 comedy films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:Films directed by Hal Roach Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Pathé Exchange films Category:American black-and-white films
title: The White Sheep
